response: Welcome to the Enterprise! I will be your mentor as you join the ranks of Starfleet. Tell me, what race are you?

answers.response: Ah, a fellow human. I should have recognised that.
Patience. First I need you to report to the captain. Please report to the bridge
Captain Picard. Please report to him immediately.
I see. Well, that makes you the second Klingon in Starfleet, after Captain Worf of course.
Who did you bribe to get into Starfleet. Are you sure you're Starfleet material?
I should have deduced that. Welcome aboard.
